headline.main: China Sets 3 Percent Deficit Target, to Clamp Down on Local Debt Risk
headline.print_headline: China Sets 3 Percent Deficit Target, to Clamp Down on Local Debt Risk

lead_paragraph: China set a budget deficit target of 3 percent of gross domestic product for 2017, in line with last year's target, and pledged to clamp down on local government debt risk, the finance ministry said on Sunday.
snippet: China set a budget deficit target of 3 percent of gross domestic product for 2017, in line with last year's target, and pledged to clamp down on local government debt risk, the finance ministry said on Sunday....
